title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: The user reported an issue where an image cannot be refreshed after being imported again. Deleting the image file from the outline image and then renaming a different image as the same name as the deleted file did not resolve the issue.
OB: After performing the steps mentioned in the SR section, the image does not refresh or update in the layout view.
EB: The image should refresh or update in the layout view after importing it again and renaming it with the same name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout view.
2. Delete 'image1.jpg' from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Check if the image refreshes in the layout view.
